::The Vok::

If Voks frowned, this one would have. It had been doing an important
job, keeping track of time, and these Ikoto came along with a probably
silly proposal and waste its time. But it supposed that watching the
planet was fairly boring. Personally, it didn't like the Ikoto, but it
had to deal with them.

"Very well, speak," it finally informed them, "I will listen, but do
not waste my time. I have an important duty to fulfil."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Azafroth / Brodak / Uokarase / Ikoto ---
> 
> Azafroth and the other Ikoto ignore the foolish Vok for a moment. 
> Azafroth's thoughts spread to the group. "Vok being." There is a 
> cool silence between the two anti-social beings. Azafroth and the 
> other Ikoto do not shimmer as they usually do. "WE have a 
> proposal that you will not turn down." Azafroth continues 
> confidently, "It concerns the planet that your were observing." The 
> Ikoto had been monitoring the Vok's progress as soon as it had 
> started moving. "Do you wish to hear our proposition." The Ikoto 
> were somewhat confident that this Vok would be interested.
